name: Balls..... And maybe some cubes...
description:
Oh great.... another player...
I'm so "not" happy....

these tasks are so trivial... a baby could solve those riddles
but ... I'm unsure if you can...

Walk around using WASD
Pick stuff up using "E"
Jump using "Space"

All except music and sound was generated during the jam

Music and sound was added after the jam - exending time to about 3.5 Hours
